authorName: Eva Borchorst MejnertzEva Borchorst MejnertzEva Borchorst Mejnertz
text:
“So, what do we do with our lives
We leave only a mark
Will our story shine like a light or end in the dark?
Give it all or nothing
We don't need another hero
We don't need to know the way home
All we want is life beyond Thunderdome”
but Tina Turner, we do need another heroine
- and love has got everything to do with it.
mediaText: Kan være et billede af 1 person
